department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Prismatic Sculpture
course.description: An introductory course focused on color as a primary attribute of sculptural form. In parallel to working with a variety of sculptural materials and processes, we will consider the definitions and limits of chromatic experience ranging from virtual to ambient to autonomous. Particular emphasis will be placed on the development of sculpture "in-the-round". The course will include readings, slide lectures, and screenings in addition to technical demonstrations and workshops.
course.prerequisites: Note: No previous studio experience required, open to all levels.
